# LLMs Information for Incredibox Sprunki Game

## Model Information
- Model: GPT-4
- Provider: OpenAI
- Version: 4.0
- Last Updated: 2024-04-29

## Usage
This website uses LLMs for:
1. Content Generation
2. Code Assistance
3. Documentation
4. User Support

## Implementation Details
- API Integration: OpenAI API
- Model Parameters:
  - Temperature: 0.7
  - Max Tokens: 2000
  - Top P: 0.9
  - Frequency Penalty: 0.0
  - Presence Penalty: 0.0

## Security & Privacy
- All user data is encrypted
- No personal information is stored
- API keys are securely managed
- Regular security audits

## Performance Metrics
- Response Time: < 2s
- Accuracy Rate: > 95%
- Error Rate: < 1%

## Maintenance
- Regular model updates
- Performance monitoring
- Error tracking
- User feedback integration

## Contact
For any questions about our LLMs implementation:
- Email: support@incrediboxsprunkigame.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/asce0110/IncrediboxSprunkigame

- OpenAI for providing the GPT-4 model
- Next.js team for the framework

- All contributors to the project
